### Linear Regression Overview 

Linear Regression is a supervised machine learning algorithm that aims to fit a line of best fit between an independent and dependant variable. In other words, it tries to find the linear relationship between the x and the y. This is also known as univariate linear regression as there is only one independent variable that is being examined against the y (dependent variable) whereas multivariate linear regression, as the name suggests, involves more than one independent variable.
